data.title: Centerville, Indiana
data.text:
At this location

Remodeling

Is there a room remodel plan for your future? Gillman Home Center in Centerville, Indiana has what you need to make that remodel plan a reality.

Leah Estes is our Home Decor Specialist. She has the tools and knowledge to be able to help you find the right cabinets, flooring, and accessories you need to make your vision become a reality!

Paint Department

If you just want to change the color of your room or the exterior of your home, stop by our paint department! Our paint department offers Best Look and Color Solutions paint. We can color paint match almost anything you bring in with our computerized color matching system.

STIHL Dealer

We are an authorized Stihl dealer and offer certified repair for Stihl products. We offer gas powered and battery powered equipment for any homeowner for any size property. Stop and talk to an associate today at Gillman Home Center in Centerville, IN for expert advice.
